about_the_game: The earth is hungry. Its heart throbs and demands terrifying beats! Brace yourself for the dark and surreal ambience from the POSTAL that started it all! The POSTAL Official Soundtrack delivers the 23 classic tracks presented in their original form.
detailed_description: The earth is hungry. Its heart throbs and demands terrifying beats! Brace yourself for the dark and surreal ambience from the POSTAL that started it all! The POSTAL Official Soundtrack delivers the 23 classic tracks presented in their original form.
legal_notice: Running With Scissors develops and publishers outrageous games just for the hell of it. POSTAL 1TM, The POSTAL DudeTM and Running With ScissorsSM are Trademarks and Service Marks of RWS, Inc.
name: POSTAL - Official Soundtrack
short_description: The POSTAL Official Soundtrack delivers all of the classic tracks of dark and surreal ambience from the POSTAL that started it all!
